doc:
Lupita Tovar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lupita_Tovar 0 Guadalupe Natalia Tovar (27 July 1910 – 12 November 2016) professionally known as Lupita Tovar, was a Mexican-American actress and centenarian best known for her starring role in the 1931 Spanish language version of Drácula, filmed in Los Angeles by Universal Pictures at night using the same sets as the Bela Lugosi version, but with a different cast and director. She also starred in the 1932 film Santa, one of the first Mexican sound films, and one of the first commercial Spanish-language sound films. Guadalupe_Natalia_Tovar ( 27_July_1910 – 12_November_2016 ) professionally_known as Lupita_Tovar , was a_Mexican-American_actress_and_centenarian best_known for her_starring_role in the_1931_Spanish_language_version of Drácula , filmed in Los_Angeles by Universal_Pictures at night using the_same_sets as the_Bela_Lugosi_version , but with a_different_cast_and_director . She also starred in the_1932_film_Santa , one of the_first_Mexican_sound_films , and one of the_first_commercial_Spanish-language_sound_films .
